navigation_bar.description: On the left-hand side you will find the navigation bar with the following options:

home_screen.description: In the home screen you can find new games and some information about them.

library_tab.description: In the library tab you can find all the games you own with some information about them and the genre.

friends_tab.description: In the friends tab, you can manage your friends.
features: Add new friends using their ID

invites_tab.description: In the invites tab, you can manage invitations.
features: Accept an invitation from a friend
Decline an invitation from a friend

lobbies_tab.description: In the lobbies tab, you can manage and join game lobbies.

features.view_open_lobbies: See open lobbies with the user and game.
features.join_lobby: Join a game from the list of open lobbies.

steps: Select a game from the dropdown filled with your owned games.
create_lobby.post_creation: Once created, your lobby will appear in the lobbies list. You can wait for a random user to join or invite a friend from the friends tab.
